simnibs.write_curv¶

simnibs.write_curv(fn, curv, fnum)¶

Writes a freesurfer .curv file

Parameters:

  • fn (str) – File name to be written

  • curv (ndaray) – Data array to be written

  • fnum (int) – Number of faces in the mesh
